instructions: Download and open the Duo app for Android or iOS . Tap Agree (Android) or I agree (iOS) to agree to the Terms of Services and Privacy Policy, then tap Give access to allow Google Duo to access your device's microphone, camera and contacts. Enter your phone number into the given field for verification and tap Next . You'll receive a verification code by text. Enter the verification code into the given field to finish setting up your account. Optionally, to customize your settings, tap the three dots in the top right corner, then tap Settings from the drop-down list.
